Function reference

All functions

con_sql_server()
Connect to SQL Server Where Data is Stored
dm_cerner_extract()
Unite All Cerner Tables and Remove Individual Tables
dm_cerner_transform()
Transform an Extracted Cerner Table in a Local dm
dm_chimerism_extract()
Extract Chimerism Table from SQL Server
dm_chimerism_transform()
Transform the Chimerism Table in a Local dm
dm_collect()
Collect All Tables in a dm Object
dm_compute()
Compute All Tables in a dm Object
dm_death_extract()
Extract Death Table from SQL Server
dm_death_transform()
Transform the Death Table in a Local dm
dm_disconnect()
Disconnect a dm Object from the Remote Server
dm_disease_status_extract()
Extract Disease Status Table from SQL Server
dm_disease_status_transform()
Transform Disease Status Table in Local dm
dm_elt()
Extract, Load, and Transform Remote Tables to Local Source
dm_engraftment_extract()
Extract Engraftment Table from SQL Server
dm_engraftment_transform()
Transform the Engraftment Table in a Local dm
dm_extract()
Select and Convert Table + Columns From Remote Source
dm_gvhd_extract()
Extract GVHD Table from SQL Server
dm_gvhd_transform()
Transform the GVHD Table in a Local dm
dm_hla_extract()
Extract and Unite HLA Tables in SQL Server
dm_hla_transform()
Transform an HLA Table in a Local dm
dm_is_remote()
Check Whether a dm Object is Connected to a Remote Server
dm_master_extract()
Extract Master Table from SQL Server
dm_master_transform()
Transform the Master Table in a Local dm
dm_mrd_extract()
Extract MRD Table from SQL Server
dm_mrd_transform()
Transform the MRD Table in a Local dm
dm_relapse_extract()
Extract Relapse Table from SQL Server
dm_relapse_transform()
Transform the Relapse Table in a Local dm
dm_sql_server()
Create a dm Object of HCT Data from Connection to SQL Server
dm_transform()
Transform Tables to Analysis-Friendly Format

Developed by Jesse Smith.
